tt:div.tt:p:
ANNOUNCER: They're
wheel-to-wheel coming out of

the last chicane,
the Frenchman DeVoe making a

run at Bivens for second,
but they won't be able to catch

Bell as he takes the flag and
oh!

It's a grrreat start to the
qualifying heats here at the
Monaco Gran Prix!

BENOIT: Your room, madame,
is no longer.
MALORY: But I had a reservation!

BENOIT: Oui madame,
mais c'est le Gran Prix.

MALORY: I don't care if it's a
Wehrmacht reunion party!

This isn't my first Grand Prix
you know.

LANA: Excusez mon amie,
elle est fatiguée --

LANA: Sans doute, mais vous avez
une réservation pour moi, non?

LANA: So where are we
supposed to sleep? !

MALORY: No. I am not sharing
a room with you.

GILLETTE: No, I'm sharing it
with you, and it's the last one
in the hotel.

No view,
but it's got two queens.

MALORY: Where's the other one,
greasing up in the bathroom?

Ray, this is fine, two of us
will just have to double up.
MALORY: I am not sharing a bed.

It's bad enough Lachouffe made
us schlep all the way to Monaco
for...

Which had better be worth this
splitting headache.

LANA: Well, it sure better be
worth four million bucks,
which is... where?

LANA: You turned Archer loose in
a casino with four million
dollars? !

He may be a vain, selfish,
lying, and quite possibly

alcoholic man-whore,
but gambling is one vice
Sterling doesn't have.

ARCHER: Guess he's too busy
doing all that other awesome
stuff. Thanks, Mother.

Why isn't there a metal
briefcase full of bearer bonds
handcuffed to your drinking arm?

ARCHER: Uh, pretty sure you just
answered your own question...

MALORY: Sterling, if you left
that briefcase in some cathouse,
I swear to God...!

The money's totally safe,
on deposit with the casino.

ARCHER: That way they comp
everything.

I call it the Sterling Archer
Triple-A Power Play, and yes,
the A stands for awesome.
MALORY: Did you get a receipt? !

ARCHER: Of course, I did,
obviously! I did that.
Now if you will excusez moi...

If you will please to follow me
to le suite royale,

where I took a liberté to ave a
woman waiting in your jacuzzi?
I was laughing at your name.

ARCHER: I mean because you know
what it sounds like, right?

ARCHER: Sounds like ben-wa
balls, Benoit.

I can't even say it without
saying balls.

BENOIT: Does monsieur require
anything else?
ARCHER: Yes I do! Benoit, balls.

Monsieur desires
more champagne, steak frites,

a post-jacuzzi female companion,
and for somebody to get up here
and fold his towels into swans.

Or actually not these towels,
some thicker ones.

As thick as possible while
still being swan-shape-foldable.

And when will monsieur desire
to try his luck at the tables?

ARCHER: Wow, what's French
for "broken record?"

BENOIT: Pardon, monsieur, but
as I said, the Suite Royal
is reserved for --

ARCHER: And there goes
my erection.

I want my luggage up here in
three minutes.

My bellopps ave been taken
prisoner by the Wehrmacht.

MALORY: Now you just listen to
me, bub --

BENOIT: Madame! The only way you
will ave zis suite is over my
lifeless corpse!

Pairaps zat will teach you to
insult ze proud nation of
Monaco!

Now if you will excuse moi,
I must go find fresh towels
and a whore.

ARCHER: Hey Benoit, not too
thick on either, O.K.!

ARCHER: Yeah, except for
my gun's all soapy.

Pretty dumb taking a bath
with it...

MALORY: Sterling I'm warning
you, if one red cent of that

money is missing when we make
the exchange with Lachouffe --

MALORY: Because they expect you
to gamble!

ARCHER: Which I'm not going
to do, duh! Mother,
I've done this tons of times.

But four million seems pretty
steep for...

And the price is irrelevant,
because you're going to steal
it back after the exchange.

MALORY: Duh. And you have to
steal it back because I, um,
slightly borrowed it.
Oh no, oh no no no no no...

Because you're not going to
screw this up, are you?

ARCHER: Oh my God, oh man,
that was fun. Thank you.

Seriously, not many women
could bring me to orgasm
in front of my mother.

Every single account has been
wiped out!

KRIEGER: And how does she have
two-point-three million
damn dollars in her 401K? !

PAM: Maybe not to you,
Glenda Gotrocks...

PAM: Stop being a frickin
jillionaire!

CYRIL: Zip it, you two! Now,
we've obviously been the victims
of identity thieves --

CHERYL/CAROL: You think it's
just a coincidence Mr. Archer

took four million dollars
to Monte Carlo?

CHERYL/CAROL: In bearer bonds,
whatever those are.

He, he's gambling away our
retirement money!

BENOIT: Lady Luck, monsieur,
she awaits your passionate
embrace!

passionate-embraced out right
now, after the tub-snorkeling.

BENOIT: In the jacuzzi of your
free suite, in which
monsieur desires to remain?
ARCHER: Uh, yes, yes he does.
Zen I wish you bonne chance!

ARCHER: I can't, I don't
have any --

ARCHER: Thanks Benoit, balls,
I don't actually --

ARCHER: What is bonk,
does that mean I --

Hang on, that was -- wait,
how much are these chips worth?

So I uh,
need to get that money back.

ARCHER: Okay what's that mean,
do I --

ARCHER: Oh my God, this is like
taking candy from a...

Speaking of candy, I'm gonna
be here a while, gorgeous,

so bring me a fifth of
Glengoolie Black and a bag of
gummi bears.

I'll eat hers if she doesn't,
um... have teeth.
No! No no no no no!

God damn it woman, wipe that
grin off your pie-face!

ARCHER: No! Ray, stop it,
I can feel a hot streak coming
on, just gimme a --

ARCHER: No thanks,
I'm not thirs --

ARCHER: Uh, well it's hard to
say, really, maybe...

GILLETTE: You lost eight hundred
grand? !

ARCHER: Ray, I said I'm
not thirs --

ARCHER: I've been really
streaky, Ray!

I was up for a while,
then down,

then up for a really long time,
but then --

GILLETTE: You've only been here
twenty minutes!

ARCHER: Wow,
seemed way longer than that...

GILLETTE: And I thought you
didn't gamble!

I had a really bad experience
one time...

And now all the candy is
Mother's...

Cause crybaby hit on seventeen
again.

ARCHER: Why was I dressed as
Hitler?

GILLETTE: Wh-? Why do you do
anything you do? !

Archer, when your mother
finds out --

ARCHER: I don't care what you
think.

But my God, Sterling
look at your clothes!

LANA: We're meeting Lachouffe
in two hours!

GILLETTE: I'll clean him up,
try to get some coffee in him.

MALORY: Make sure that's all you
put in him!

MALORY: Keep it in your pants,
sister.

LANA: Wow, all these years,
I've never seen Archer like,
drunk drunk.

MALORY: What the hell good
are ya?
Why was he dressed as Hitler?
Ooh, I think I see a duke!

Glad you can still be snotty,
while Archer's gambling away
your 401K!
PAM: Tell her I said hey!
CYRIL: Shut up, and ours too!

LANA: Archer wasn't gambling,
he was just drun...
CYRIL: Lana, did you hear me?

CROUPIER: Jusqu'il a perdu trois
millions.
PAM: Cyril tell her I said --

ARCHER: I -- look,
I said I was sorry!

ARCHER: Well? ! Whatever,
I have a plan to get the money

back -- which doesn't include
you taking my hotel toiletries!

GILLETTE: Go look at your pores
and then tell me your using 'em.

And then tell me your little
genius plan.
ARCHER: Ray, we can do this!

C'mon, I've broken into
way tougher places!

I mean, not without my
turtleneck, but --

GILLETTE: Do you even know
where the bearer bonds are? !

ARCHER: Well no, not exactly,
but --

GILLETTE: What's it say on the
receipt?
That you didn't get, did you?

GILLETTE: You know why they're
called bearer bonds?

GILLETTE: Because they're
unregistered and untraceable,

and the legal owner of a bearer
bond is whatever asshole

physically holds the piece of
paper!

ARCHER: Well then I dunno why
you're so pissed off.

Because your mother cleaned out
all the ISIS 401K accounts!

GILLETTE: I had almost two
hundred grand in there, you --

ARCHER: Down! Ray, put it down
or I swear --
ARCHER: How am I the bad guy? !

Mother's the one who stole our
retirement money!
GILLETTE: He does have a point.

LANA: Why would she pay
four million bucks for
unverified information?

GILLETTE: Well, either she's
getting Alzheimer's --

GILLETTE: Or she thinks it's
another sex tape.

ARCHER: Actually that wouldn't
surprise me.

LANA: Well whatever's on the
disk, Lachouffe expects

four million dollars
in bearer bonds,
and we only have one million --

GILLETTE: For which there is no
receipt.

ARCHER: Look, Lana, I feel bad
enough as it is.

LANA: You couldn't feel bad
enough.

LANA: Shut up,
so here's what we're gonna do.

First, we have to keep Malory
occupied while we go meet
Lachouffe...

She's in the bar,
hitting on a duke...

MALORY: I bet you get chilly at
night, all alone
in that great big castle...

LANA: But judging from the way
Sir Duke was eye-banging

the waiters, I don't think
she's gonna have much luck.

So Ray,
that's where you come in...

GILLETTE: Yeah, he's like
a thousand.

LANA: You're not gonna have
sex with him --

GILLETTE: Well wait,
he is a duke...

Because you'll be making the
exchange with Lachouffe.

ARCHER: But wait,
he's expecting Mother.

LANA: When Lachouffe realizes
we don't have four million
dollars in bearer bonds...

LANA: We'll take out his
bodyguards.

GILLETTE: What the hell
does she keep in here?

LANA: Then, having retrieved
your mother's disgusting
sex tape --

LANA: We figure out a way to get
our 401K money back.

ARCHER: Yeah hi, duh,
we just steal the bearer bonds
from the casino.

GILLETTE: If they're even in the
casino!

ARCHER: Well where else would
they be, Ray? !

LANA: Well you better hope
they're in the vault.

ANNOUNCER: It's the second
qualifying round of the Monaco

Gran Prix and oh, they're really
burning up the streets of
Monte Carlo!

LANA: No, this is not
at all great!

They're already tied up,
and we don't even have any rope,
so --

GILLETTE: Man, you can have
these control-tops.

No wonder your mother's such
a bitch.

ARCHER: Wh-? Can you not rub
your dick in my mother's
pantyhose? ! Please? !

LANA: Why would somebody tie up
the guards?

ARCHER: Duh! So they could
rob the oh shit.
LANA: Qui a volé le coffre-fort?

ARCHER: How the hell
would he know? !

GILLETTE: Well he couldn't have
gone far in ten minutes,
it's a zoo out there.

Because if we don't get my 401K
back, you won't live long enough
to regret you were ever born.

KRIEGER: Now is that
bulletproof, or what? !

GANG LEADER: Yeah,
y'all I didn't even feel that!

KRIEGER: I can let it out,
and I can let all this stuff go

dollars,
and I'll even throw in the
Chokebot.

CYRIL: Krieger, what the hell
are you doing?

KRIEGER: I'm selling ISIS
equipment until I get every
damn cent of my 401K back!

CYRIL: Oh... So hey, how'd you
guys like a color copier and
about, say, eighty computers?

LANA: Dammit, we're never
gonna find Benoit!

ARCHER: Balls,
and we might if you two would

stop being bitches for five
seconds!
LANA: Hand over the bag, Benoit!

ARCHER: Balls,
no, the moment's ruined.

GILLETTE: How're we supposed to
catch him now? !

ARCHER: Wow, this might be hard
to drive... with such a huge,
throbbing erection.

ANNOUNCER: Well Dennis,
it's a strange tairn of events
here at the Gran Prix!

Because look here now,
who could believe it? !

A woman driving in a
Formula One race!

No, you just don't see that
everyday!

ARCHER: He's heading for the
coast road!

ARCHER: Is it obvious he has a
gun? !
Ow do you like those pommes? !

LANA: What the hell're you
doing? !

ARCHER: Shooting out his tires
so he loses control and flies
off the cliff!

LANA: That was actually
pretty ballsy...

ARCHER: And I never got my
swan-shaped towels!
BENOIT: I can't see, you fool!

ARCHER: Dammit Lana,
I said not -- oh shit!

Y'all! Y'all my car is slowing
down for some unknown reason!

Just must be out of carburetor
LANA: Archer, look out!

ARCHER: Yeah, an attack
helicopter and a rocket
launcher, Lana, I see it!

There's this new thing called
situational awareness? !
And I'm fine, since you asked.

LANA: So, guess that's it for
Lachouffe and Benoit...

You are so lucky
this worked out.

ARCHER: Well you know what they
say, Lana, unlucky at cards,
lucky at...

a whole shitload of all kinds
of other stuff.

MALORY: Why are you drinking
again? !

We're meeting Lachouffe
in ten minutes!

ARCHER: And I just assume I

MALORY: Don't worry,
Nosey Parker, you won't.

But it's a lot more interesting
than my afternoon.

You'd think that duke had never
been with a woman before...

And every dime of the four
million better be in that bag.

ARCHER: It is, and while
we're on the subject --

GILLETTE: Thanks for stealing

MALORY: I -- first of all,
if that's my Chanel suit I will

MALORY: And second of all,
I didn't steal that money,
I merely borrowed it.
LANA: Well just for the record?

I think using our 401K's as

incredibly lame.

MALORY: And just for the record
I don't care.

That being said, we better
hurry up and redeposit this.

No telling what those idiots

GANG LEADER: Been a real

CHERYL/CAROL: So wait,

stuff and then pay us for it?

CYRIL: Me? ! Hey, I'm not

Plus I gave 'em all my stickers.
